p: Baobab crude oil samples showed higher saponification values of 219.87 ± 2.8, 217.45 ± 0.77, and 210.83 ± 0.45 mg/KOH for Iringa, Dodoma, and Kilimanjaro regions, respectively ( Table 2). The highest average value was obtained from Iringa region, and the lowest value was obtained from Kilimanjaro region.
